code: import{ADD_TO_CART}from'../constants/actionTypes';var cartProduct=function cartProduct(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:[];var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case ADD_TO_CART:return state.concat(action.cartProduct);default:return state;}};export default cartProduct;
